${ModID}:OlexasCloak.NAME: Olexa's Cloak
${ModID}:OlexasCloak.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ${ModID}:Hoard !hoard!: Gain !B! Block. NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist! .

${ModID}:HuttsGamble.NAME: Hutt's Gamble
${ModID}:HuttsGamble.DESCRIPTION: If you don't receive unblocked attack damage this turn, gain [E] and draw 2 cards next turn.
${ModID}:HuttsGamble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you don't receive unblocked attack damage this turn, gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards next turn.

${ModID}:Tricky.NAME: Tricky
${ModID}:Tricky.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card drawn during this turn.

${ModID}:SneakyteakStrike.NAME: Sneakyteak Strike
${ModID}:SneakyteakStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a *Darkside *Slap on top of your draw pile.
${ModID}:SneakyteakStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a *Darkside *Slap+ on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:DarksideSlap.NAME: Darkside Slap
${ModID}:DarksideSlap.DESCRIPTION: Exhausts at the end of the turn. NL Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:Wanderbots.NAME: Wanderbots
${ModID}:Wanderbots.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 ${ModID}:Wanderbot. NL Triger the passive effect of all your Orbs.

${ModID}:Retromation.NAME: Retromation
${ModID}:Retromation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a card from a Pack not available to your draft. NL It gains Ethereal.

${ModID}:OddOne.NAME: Odd One
${ModID}:OddOne.DESCRIPTION: Odd: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Even: Draw !M! card.
${ModID}:OddOne.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Odd: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Even: Draw !M! cards.
